description:
The following methods in nova.network.neutron.v2.api are not implemented (well, they throw NotImplemented exceptions)

- create_private_dns_domains
- create_public_dns_domains
- get_dns_entries_by_address
- get_dns_entries_by_name
- get_dns_domains
- add_dns_entry
- modify_dns_entry
- delete_dns_entry
- delete_dns_domain
title: Call to dns related APIs are not implemented when using neutron

comments.content:
The following methods in nova.network.neutron.v2.api are not implemented (well, they throw NotImplemented exceptions)

- create_private_dns_domains
- create_public_dns_domains
- get_dns_entries_by_address
- get_dns_entries_by_name
- get_dns_domains
- add_dns_entry
- modify_dns_entry
- delete_dns_entry
- delete_dns_domain
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~beagles

comments.content:
So rather than multiple bug reports documenting bits missing in the proxying of neutron information in Nova I think instead we should do this as a single blueprint which covers all of the different areas where we need better neutron support.

Though note that the long term goal is to remove proxying of neutron information in Nova.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~cyeoh-0
